text: Dragi Zmijanac (born 25 February 1960 in Skopje) is a Macedonian social worker, humanitarian and children's rights activist. == Biography == Zmijanac was born in Skopje on 25 February 1960. In April 1992, he founded the First children's embassy in the world - Megjashi, which promotes and protects children's rights as well as provides support for child victims of violence and abuse. == References == Category:Macedonian human rights activists Category:1960 births Category:Living people
title: Dragi Zmijanac
